settings: When the screen shows the Home interface with a search box and navigation bar on the left, it means that Settings has been opened.
No need to open Settings in plan.
When setting the default app, first search for the software you want to set on the 'Default Apps' page, then click on it, which is divided into two subtasks.
Once you are on the 'Default Apps' page, search or scroll to find the Google Chrome app.
When setting the default browser, you must first find the 'Google Chrome' software, and then click it. After that, click on the 'Set default' tab at next step.
